description: There's a new Team17 Humble Bundle live and it includes a pretty interesting selection of games for you to begin stocking up for May.
title: Pick up Golf With Your Friends, Trepang2, Gord, Neon Abyss and more in this bundle

description: Valve have revealed the most played Steam Deck games for April 2024, and to no surprise you've all be playing a whole lot of Fallout haven't you.
title: Steam Deck most played for April 2024 has plenty of Fallout

description: I've no idea how I missed Bye Sweet Carole being announced a good while ago, but maybe you did too and it deserves a look because it honestly looks pretty incredible. Created by Chris Darril of the Remothered series it looks like it really does blend classic Disney movies, with a more mature horror theme.
title: Bye Sweet Carole blends horror with what looks like classic Disney movies

description: Pocketpair's absolute smash-hit Early Access game Palworld is set to expanding, with some new Pals being teased that will be coming sometime this Summer.
title: Palworld is bringing in fun new Pals for you to put to work

description: Dr. Robotnik's Ring Racers is an awesome free kart racing fan game, and not only is there a new release out but the Linux version is now ready to be downloaded and played too.
title: Dr. Robotnik's Ring Racers v2.1 out with Linux support now available

description: Poking a bit of fun at Ubisoft for calling Skull and Bones "AAAA", poncle have released a fresh free update to Vampire Survivors with the AAAA Laborratory update.
title: Vampire Survivors gets a AAAA update with functional doors, a train and rail kart racing

description: If you have half an hour free and fancy cozying up with a little something, check out the new free release of Clothes Line.
title: Clothes Line is a sweet free little adventure game about a retired old lady

description: What could potentially be a The Sims killer, Paradox Interactive plan to finally launch Life by You into Early Access on June 4th after multiple delays.
title: The huge life-sim Life by You from Paradox hits Early Access on June 4

description: Tails of Iron 2: Whiskers of Winter is releasing with Native Linux support later in 2024, and it's looking really good! Odd Bug Studio just put up a new trailer show off plenty of gameplay.
title: Tails of Iron 2: Whiskers of Winter has a brutal new trailer

description: Jackbox Games are finally doing a special little pack of games just for adults with the teased Jackbox Naughty Pack.
title: Soon you'll be able to spice up your parties with the Jackbox Naughty Pack

description: Towards the end of April, NVIDIA released the 550.78 driver and if you use a notebook with a RTX 4xxx series GPU you may want to update for this one.
title: NVIDIA 550.78 released fixing issues for RTX 4xxx series GPUs notebooks
